Integrable Probability, Classical and Quantum Integrability

PIICQ is an International Research Project funded by INSMI, the mathematical institute of CNRS. It aims at investigating the interplay between (classical and quantum) integrability and integrable probability. The name is the French acronym of “Probabilités Intégrables, Intégrabilité Classique et Quantique”.
